org.drip.param.market

Interface ComponentMarketParamRef

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bond, CalibratableComponent, Cash, Component, CreditComponent, CreditDefaultSwap, EDFuture, InterestRateSwap

    public interface ComponentMarketParamRef
    This interface provides stubs for component name, IR curve, credit curve, TSY curve, and EDSF curve needed to value the component.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getComponentName()
      Gets the component name
      java.lang.String getCreditCurveName()
      Gets the credit curve name
      java.lang.String getEDSFCurveName()
      Gets the EDSF curve name
      java.lang.String getIRCurveName()
      Gets the IR curve name
      java.lang.String getTreasuryCurveName()
      Gets the treasury curve name
